amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce funding for the USDA Office of Civil Rights by 50% from FY23 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Agriculture Department's Office of Civil Rights by $3,789,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 254 (Roll no. 408).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 254 (Roll no. 408).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
